name: Juan Camilo Campillo
description: Technology enthusiast, always seeking new challenges and learning opportunities in the world of web development and digital innovation.

storyCard1.title: My Beginning
storyCard1.description: Passionate about technology from an early age, I began my journey in web development by building small projects that soon turned into real solutions.

storyCard2.title: My Evolution
storyCard2.description: My curiosity for new technologies has led me to explore various fields, from frontend development to systems architecture.

storyCard3.title: My Present
storyCard3.description: Today, I dedicate myself to creating exceptional digital experiences and sharing my knowledge with the community.

work.currentDescription: Development of modern web applications using React, Next.js and TypeScript. Technical leadership in key projects.
work.previousDescription: Implementation of responsive user interfaces and web application performance optimization.
